name: Gravity Slime (MaidAndReady)
description:
In the search for a new source of power, an evil wizard inadvertently created a new life form, the slime. As the wizard quickly discovered, each new slime he created had a unique and powerful ability. The wizard began making slimes day and night, taking each and placing them in magical containers that would make the slimes’ power his own. You play as the wizards' latest experiment, the gravity slime. Using your power to invert gravity, you were able to avoid being sealed and began your escape from the wizards lab. Along the way you’ll rescue your fellow slimes and free them from the oppression of the wizard.

Gravity slime is a auto-scrolling 2D-platformer with the main mechanic being that you can invert gravity.
